channel.title: How can I make it so only an item can be wear by Mod or Admin
channel.description:
How can I make it so only an item can be wear by Mod or Admin. It would be cool if you could give me a code and where to place it
Thanks.

item.title: How can I make it so only an item can be wear by Mod or Admin
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

I wrote an entire tutorial on this. It hasn’t been approved yet on this site, but read it by going to this link:
http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=21871

It is the cleanest, best, and easiest way to do it

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make it so only an item can be wear by Mod or Admin

item.title: How can I make it so only an item can be wear by Mod or Admin
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“ginger_ninja, post:4, topic:298500”]try this…[code]if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NameHere)) {
if((playerEquipment[playerRing] == 1635)) {
remove(playerEquipment[playerRing], playerRing);
sendMessage(“You Can’t Wear This!.”);
}
}
if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 773){
if(IsDead);
IsDead = false;
NewHP = playerLevel[3];
}[/code
this is a code to make you invincle so lol yeah, you need to be a person namehere if you want admins to wear it change it to

if(playerights == 3) { if((playerEquipment[playerRing] == 1635)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerRing], playerRing); sendMessage("You Can't Wear This!."); } } if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 773){ if(IsDead); IsDead = false; NewHP = playerLevel[3]; }[/code][/quote]

How can I make it with playerRights = 1 or 2 or 3 ?

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make it so only an item can be wear by Mod or Admin

try this…[code]if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NameHere)) {
if((playerEquipment[playerRing] == 1635)) {
remove(playerEquipment[playerRing], playerRing);
sendMessage(“You Can’t Wear This!.”);
}
}
if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 773){
if(IsDead);
IsDead = false;
NewHP = playerLevel[3];
}[/code
this is a code to make you invincle so lol yeah, you need to be a person namehere if you want admins to wear it change it to

if(playerights == 3) { if((playerEquipment[playerRing] == 1635)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerRing], playerRing); sendMessage("You Can't Wear This!."); } } if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 773){ if(IsDead); IsDead = false; NewHP = playerLevel[3]; }[/code]
